Key Match Events: Lungi Ngidi was named Player of the Match with figures of 4/29
Suryakumar Yadav was named Cricinfo's MVP with 128.55 points
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Perth Stadium
Others: The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup and South Africa tour of Australia
The match was played on October 30, 2022
David Boon was the match referee
The match ended with South Africa winning by 5 wickets with 2 balls remaining
